# Description

Creates folder structures and puts data in it

# Installation

`pip install dtgn`

# Usage

**From command line:**

`python -m dtgn`

| Option | Short | Type | Default | Description |
|---|---|---|---|---|
|--path | -p | String | - | Example path |


# Example

`python -m dtgn`

Add example here...
